document_data.caption: A map of the village of Ostrav.
document_data.name: Ostrav
document_data.mainbody: '''Ostrav''' was a small farming village found in the grasslands of the [[Duchy of Arcata]] in [[Damara]] along the [[Beaumaris River]].
document_data.Activities:
Despite their relatively small size, the politically neutral community managed to survive and thrive during desperate times such as the rise of [[Zhengyi]].

Ostrav was known for its friendly inhabitants and fabulous inns.
